details.purpose: To record data found on examination through palpation.
details.use: To be embedded in the openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.exam cluster to express findings determined by palpation.
details.misuse: Not for use in any other context at present.

items.items: Textural statement of the findings on palpation.
Superficial palpation of the skin and superficial muscles.
Palpation of the deep structures beneath superficial muscles.
The type of tenderness found on palpation.
The region, site or organ that is the object of localised palpation.
The palpation is apparently normal but some uncertainty exists.
No abnormality was detected by palpation.
A group of statements about a tenderness finding.
The amount or degree of tenderness found on palpation.
There is some feeling of pain or discomfort on palpation.
There is definite pain on palpation.
Gentle palpation leads to moderate pain.
Gentle palpation leads to severe pain.
The abdomen is rigid to palpation.
The temperature feels cooler than normal.
The temperature feels warmer than normal.
Detailed examination of things found on palpation.
The consistency of the surface or border of the object of palpation.
The surface is hard or rigid.
Findings related to the surface or border of the object of palpation.
Features of the surface or border.
The surface or border is smooth.
The surface or border is irregular.
A group of statements about the normality of the palpation.
The palpation revealed no distension, masses or rigidity.
The surface is soft with a boggy quality.
The border or surface retains indentation after firm pressure is applied.
The surface of the object of palpation.
The border of the object of palpation.
Details of the location of the surface or border palpated.
Tensing of underlying muscles on palpation.
The guarding is apparently deliberate on the part of the person.
The guarding is occuring without intent from the person.
The guarding is not clearly involuntary or voluntary.
There is some guarding with deep palpation.
There is guarding on moderate palpation.
There is guarding on very gentle palpation.
Presence of a cough impulse felt on palpation.
